contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 16, 1899 D Ashington Contest
Ashington Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
ashington-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
La Traviata [unknown arranger]
New Hirst, Ashington, Northumberland, England, UK Open to bands which had not won a prize exceeding £5 in 1898 or 1899 Prizes: £5, £3, £2, £1, 10s March contest prizes £1, 10s March contest - 1st Backworth (3 .G.'s), 2nd Wardley (Soldiers Return) Result as originally given but objection raised about Jarrow playing non registered players. They were disqualified on 30th September , but an objection was then raised about Newbiggin not being registered at all. Matter had not been resolved by 31st October 1899.
Aug. 9, 2013, 10:10 p.m. Jan. 12, 2017, 4:30 p.m.
1 Jarrow Borough Thomas Henderson
2 Newbiggin-by-the-Sea Thomas Floyd
3 Wardley Colliery Prize Silver Band George Perry
4 Backworth Colliery Band Unknown
